content: The number of adults estimated to be living with diabetes has nearly quadrupled over 35 years, the World Health Organisation (WHO) has said, warning that it has increased drastically because of "the way people eat, move and live".

title: The number of adults estimated to be living with diabetes has nearly quadrupled over 35 years.
